title: New Cycle Time
content: Starting Sepember 5th the cylcle time will be moved to the evening. Reason being that live communities suggested this change.

title: New KSM Faucet
content: All Encointer citizens can now get KSM benefits on top of their community income. Learn how: https://youtu.be/yoc9PDPc8lU

title: Transaction Error Alert
content:
An upgrade on Kusama has been enacted today which was only expected a few days later and the current app will not be able to send transactions until the upcoming update has been released (you'll see a verification error). We'll do what we can to ship the fix within hours. We are very sorry for the inconvenience.

 please update your app to >= 1.14.1 for a fix
